text:
@senatemajldr Just when you think you’ve seen it all. The White House conducted a briefing on the Coronavirus yesterday, but Americans didn’t get to watch or listen because the White House refused to allow TV or audio recording. Worried much?
https://t.co/ceg772sFqD
